title: Open Beta Client
body: I've tried numerous times to update the recent open beta client but every single time, half way though, an error occurs and I have to reinstall League if I would like to play again. Is there anyone who can help me with my problem?

replies.body:
What does the error say and when does it happen exactly?  You can also return to the legacy client through the following means:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Hope that helps.

I meant like I cant download the Beta client at all. Like half way through, the error window says,"an unspecified error has occurred. Please check the logs for more information." Do you have any idea what this means?
